mapper.insert:
SELECT sys_guid() from DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER( id, member_number, real_name, sex, age, mobile, mobile_status, id_card, id_card_status, status, email, email_status, referrer, refer_count, province, city, register_ip, client, create_time, update_time, trade_password, channel_code, channel_name ) VALUES( #{id}, SEQ_MEMBER.nextval, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referrer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referCount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{client,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, sysdate, #{tradePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, )
